metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8164 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in rails < 5.2.4.3, rails < 6.0.3.1 which can allow an attacker to supply information can be inadvertently leaked fromStrong Parameters.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
